scripts.clean: npm --workspaces --if-present run clean && npx shx rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist
scripts.cleanBuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.cleanBuildProduction: npm run clean && npm run buildProduction
scripts.deepClean: npx shx rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist coverage jest temp package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?*
scripts.reset: npm run deepClean && npm install && npm run build && (npm link || sudo npm link) && shx chmod +x bin/*.js && npx jest --clearCache
scripts.git:status: git status && git branch -vv && git diff dev origin/dev && git stash list
scripts.git:remote: git remote -v && git remote show origin
scripts.git:hardreset:main: git fetch origin && git checkout main && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.git:hardreset:dev: git fetch origin && git checkout dev && git reset --hard origin/dev
scripts.git:hardreset:edge: git fetch origin && git checkout edge && git reset --hard origin/edge
scripts.runMeBeforePublish: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm pkg delete devDependencies scripts && npx shx rm -rf node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?* && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.prepublishOnlyProduction: npm run cleanBuildProduction && npm pkg delete devDependencies scripts && npx shx rm -rf node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?* && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.npmPack: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnlyProduction && npm pack && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -f package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagDev: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnlyProduction && npm publish --tag dev && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -f package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagEdge: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnlyProduction && npm publish --tag edge && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -f package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagLatest: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnlyProduction && npm publish --tag latest && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -f package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:latest: npm install --save-exact @matter/main@latest && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:dev: npm install --save-exact @matter/main@dev && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:loc: npm install ../matter.js/packages/matter.js && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.install:dependencies: npm install --save-exact @matter/main archiver express glob multer node-ansi-logger node-persist-manager ws
scripts.install:scripts: npm install --save-dev --save-exact npm-check-updates shx cross-env marked
scripts.install:eslint: npm install --save-dev --save-exact eslint @eslint/js typescript-eslint eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-n eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-jsdoc
scripts.buildAll: npm run build && npm --workspaces run build
scripts.lintAll: npm run lint && npm --workspaces run lint
scripts.testAll: npm run test && npm --workspaces run test
